price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߰ߦߊ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ( ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߯ߙߊ) ߓߋ߬ߟߌ ߟߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߗߋߥߊߟߌ ߟߎ߬ ߕߌߢߍ߫
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَتَعۡسٗا لَّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū fataʿsan lahum wa-aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: and He will cause to be lost
